name: Rainco
wishText: May the love and hope always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! You must be healthy and halcyon
text2: That's birthday card I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are my honeybear,luckymoon.You are my everything.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
